cyber-dojo.sh:
rm -f *.class
CLASSES=.:`ls /cucumber/*.jar | tr '\n' ':'`
javac -Xlint:unchecked -cp $CLASSES  *.java
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
  java -cp $CLASSES org.junit.runner.JUnitCore `ls -1 *Test*.class | grep -v '\\$' | sed 's/\(.*\)\..*/\1/'`
fi
hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hearing a shout

    Shouts have a range of approximately 1000 metres

    Scenario Outline: Only hear in-range shouts
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        And Sean is at <Seans-location>
        When Sean shouts
        Then Lucy should <what-Lucy-hears>
        
        Examples: in range examples
            | Seans-location | what-Lucy-hears  | 
            | 0, 900         | hear Sean        |
            | 800, 800       | not hear anything|
  
      Scenario: Multiple shouters
        Given people are located at
        |name   | x    | y    |
        |Lucy   | 0    | 0    |
        |Sean   | 0    | 500  |
        |Oscar  | 1100 | 0    |
        When Sean shouts
        And Oscar shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Oscar
        But Lucy should hear Sean
        
       Scenario: Shouter does not hear own shout
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        When Lucy shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Lucy

        Scenario: Multiple shouts from one person
          Given Lucy is at 0, 0
          And Sean is at 0, 500
          When Sean shouts
          And Sean shouts
          Then Lucy should hear 2 shouts from Sean
output:
ShoutSteps.java:23: error: boolean cannot be dereferenced
        Assert.assertEquals(numberShouts, shouty.getShoutsHeardBy(listener).containsKey(shouter).size());
                                                                                                ^
1 error
do_not_disturb.txt:
Feature: Do not disturb

    Scenario: Listener mutes all shouts
        Given Lucy is at 0, 0
        And Sean is at 500, 0
        And Lucy is in do not disturb mode
        When Sean shouts
        Then Lucy should not hear Sean
    
    Scenario: Listener mutes based on distance
        Given people are located at
        |name   | x    | y    |
        |Lucy   | 0    | 0    |
        |Sean   | 0    | 499  |
        |Oscar  | 0    | 501  |
        And Lucy sets do not disturb to 500 metres
        When Sean shouts
        And Oscar shouts
        Then Lucy should hear Sean
        And Lucy should not hear Oscar

    Scenario: Listener mutes specific shouters
        Given people are located at
        |name   | x    | y    |
        |Lucy   | 0    | 0    |
        |Sean   | 0    | 500  |
        |Oscar  | 0    | 500  |
        And Lucy sets do not disturb to Sean
        When Sean shouts
        And Oscar shouts
        Then Lucy should hear Oscar
        And Lucy should not hear Sean

    Scenario: Listener unmutes specific shouter
        Given people are located at
            |name   | x    | y    |
            |Lucy   | 0    | 0    |
            |Sean   | 0    | 499  |
        And Lucy sets do not disturb to Sean
        And Lucy unsets do not disturb to Sean
        When Sean shouts
        Then Lucy should hear Sean
        

    Scenario: Listener sees shouts missed during do not disturb
        Given people are located at
        |name   | x    | y    |
        |Lucy   | 0    | 0    |
        |Sean   | 0    | 499  |
        And Lucy sets do not disturb
        And Sean shouts
        When Lucy disables do not disturb
        Then Lucy should hear Sean
